answers.answer: Try bathing your feet and hands in cold water and then elevating your feet. If you haven't done already you need to let your midwife / care provider know as major or sudden swelling of the hands and feet can be a symptom of preeclampsia (my apologies if you've already done that)

question: I am 34+3 and im experiencing major feet and hand swelling :-( does any one no how I can make it any easier to cope xx
title: swelling
